1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Kevin McCloud and the Big Town Plan (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Architects compete to design a new pedestrian bridge over Castleford's river, which could improve residents' quality of life and become an attraction.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Kevin McCloud and the Big Town Plan (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: This programme looks at plans to rejuvenate three run-down green spaces in some of the hardest-hit neighbourhoods in Castleford in Yorkshire.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Kevin McCloud and the Big Town Plan (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Kevin McCloud follows attempts to revitalise Castleford's failing town centre market. But will fancy new stalls be enough to save it.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Kevin McCloud and the Big Town Plan (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Kevin McCloud concludes his look at Castleford's attempts to revitalise itself with two vital schemes: traffic-calming the town's residential heart and a controversial underpass.

imdb.title: Kevin McCloud and the Big Town Plan
akas: Kevin McCloud and the Big Town Plan (United Kingdom)
plot: Grand designs presenter kevin mccloud follows an innovative community-led regeneration scheme in the former mining town of castleford in yorkshire.
